Node.rule: S option startInitDP with DP initial elements and final ya na & Quote allowed
InitP option address - DP address or focus/topic - root or nonroot
CP option 1 - no fronting, root or non-root
IP option 2cInonroot - subject initial, required, nonroot clause
VP option 1PPno - adjoined PP, no need for compound test
PP option 2a - optional adverbial or Deg before
P' option 1a - prepositions, DP complement only - not for bray, bh not pronoun o
NP option 1bposs - no separate marker, possessor final
VP option 1PP - adjoined PP, possible compound situation
PP option 2a - optional adverbial or Deg before
P' option 1a - prepositions, DP complement only - not for bray, bh not pronoun o
VP option 2a - V initial/final, intransitive or copular
IP option 2cI - subject initial, required, root clause
VP option 2a - V initial/final, intransitive or copular
